thing-type.label: Nova SDS011 Fine Dust Sensor
thing-type.description: Nova SDS011 Fine Dust Sensor connected via USB

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: USB Port
parameter.description: USB port the device is connected to i.e. /dev/ttyUSB0

parameter.name: reporting
parameter.label: Mode
parameter.description: Reporting is strongly recommended to increase sensor lifetime

parameter.name: reportingInterval
parameter.label: Reporting Interval
parameter.description: Device will report every x minutes and sleep for x*60 - 30 seconds afterwards, 0 = as fast as possible without sleep

parameter.name: pollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Device will be polled every x seconds (polling is not recommended)
